constraints.name: recurrence_relation
constraints.description: 数列的第 n 项由前 k 项的线性组合决定（齐次线性递推关系）
constraints.formal: a_n = Σ (f_i * a_{n-i}) for i in [1, k]

constraints.name: initial_values
constraints.description: 数列的前 k 项是给定的初始值

constraints.name: modular_arithmetic
constraints.description: 最终结果需要对 998244353 取模
